title: [Large-scale] Science Teaching and Learning Continuity Design Strategies in Corporate Settings During the Pandemic Era

context.prior_knowledge: Higher education completion and 3+ years of science-related professional experience
context.additional_context: The goal is for science practitioners to acquire flexible teaching-learning strategies to maintain operational continuity during pandemics

learning_goals: Learners can structure corporate science education programs in three phases (planning-execution-evaluation) using a mixed-methods instructional design framework.
Learners can design five or more integrated offline/online learning activities considering internet accessibility constraints.
Learners can create a technology infrastructure checklist for implementing flexible learning environments and apply it to real educational settings.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
